RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professor Titular de Geometria, SISSA (Trieste, Itlia). De Maio de 2019 professor visitante snior no Departamento de Matemtica da UFPB. Tem experincia na rea de Matemtica, com nfase em Geometria Algbrica, Geometria Complexa, e Fisca Matemtica. Trabalha em espaos de mduli de estruturas geomtricas, resolues de singularidades e aplicaes s teorias de campos supersimtricas e de corda. Possui longa experincia como orientador de teses de doutorado e mestrado. Participou de vrias conferncias internacionais como orador convidado, tambm como um "keynote speaker".
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Professor of Geometry, SISSA (Trieste, Italy). Since May 2019 Senior Visiting Professor in the Department of Mathematics of UFPB. Has experience in Mathematics, working in algebraic and complex geometry and mathematical physics, in particular the study of moduli spaces of geometric structures and its application to supersymmetric field theory and string theory. Has a long experience as thesis advisor at the PhD and master level. Was invited as a speaker at several international conferences, also as "keynote speaker".

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
I have been the main investigator of several projects that have been awarded grants from the Italian Ministry for Education and Research, the National Institute of Nuclear Physics, the Firuli-Venezia Giulia regional government, the Istituto Nazionale di Alta Matematica.

I have held visiting positions at Princeton University, (USA), Universidad de Salamanca (Spain), Victoria University of Wellington (New Zealand), City University of New York, Universit Paris VI, Universit de Lille (France), University of Pennsylvania, Institue des Hautes Etudes Scientifiques (Paris), Max-Planck-Insitut fr Mathematik (Bonn, Germany), Universidade de So Paulo, Universidade Federal da Paraba

Moreover I made short visits in many universities in USA, France, United Kingdom, Spain, Australia, Germany, China, Canada, Ukraine, Brazil, Japan, Italy.

During February 2004 I spent two weeks at ?Mathematische Frschunginstitut Oberwolfach? (Germany) as a ?Research in pairs? fellow.

 I have organized (or participated in the scientic committees of) 30 international conferences. In particular since 1996 I am the main organizer of the series "Schools and Workshops on Algebraic Geometry and Physics," that have taken place in Trieste, Medina del Campo (Spain), Marseille, Genova, Como, Salamanca, Lisbon, Philadelphia, Vienna, Seoul, Hangzhou (China), Maresias (Brazil), Saint Jean de Monts (France), Leiden (The Netherlands).

I am member of the Scientic Committees of the interdisciplinary project "More Geometrico" which organizes a yearly conference, and of the VBAC (Vector Bundles on Algebraic Curves) conference series.

ENDERECO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-ORGAO: Centro de Cincias Exatas e da Natureza - Campus I

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Rendiconti dell'Istituto di Matematica dell'Universita di Trieste

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A national Italian project to foster researchers in the general area of algebraic geometry and in particular in the geometry of algebraic varieties, in its classical aspects (projective and birational geometry) and in its more modern developments (deformation theory, moduli spaces, geometric invariants, applications to mathematical physics). I am the coordinator of the SISSA unit of this project.
